body:
The instigator here is the master's friend who is another master. That's where the NTR part comes in. It's not super clear to me in the translated version why he's involved with these girls in the first place.

He uses his command seals on the two versions of Jeanne but Nightingale is happy to oblige him without. I suppose you could also add a cheating tag for her portion of the story (not sure if she's mind controlled to begin with).
Hey, do you wanna fuсk mе? find me here - sex-rooms.com  (free chat-rooms with me)
How the heck is this NTR?

Halooooo~~~

Bagi yang pengen chat, ngumpul random aja, silahkan join server discord di link ini yaa:

https://discord.gg/Ztf43q5G

Thankss
